history.proof: intros H. qsimpl time: 1 use: lb_minus. qsimpl time: 1 use: lb_minus. qsimpl time: 1 use: lb_ortho_plus_join,lb_minus. apply VarMap.find. + qsimpl time: 1 use: lb_ortho_plus_join,lb_minus,lb_ortho_anti_left. qsimpl time: 1 use: lb_ortho_plus_join,lb_minus,lb_ortho_anti_left. qsimpl time: 1 use: lb_ortho_plus_join,lb_minus,lb_ortho_sym,lb_ortho_anti_left. apply VarMap.find. - qsimpl time: 1 use: lb_ortho_sym,lb_minus,lb_ortho_plus_join,lb_join_inc_left,lb_ortho_anti_left. hauto l: on depth: 3. - sfirstorder depth: 3. - sfirstorder depth: 3. + sfirstorder depth: 3. + sfirstorder depth: 3.

exceptions.tactic: destruct (lb_minus a b H) as [c [Hc1 Hc2]].
exceptions.exn: In environment a, b : lb H : a ⪯ b The term "a" has type "lb" while it is expected to have type "?a ⪯ ?b".
The reference c was not found in the current environment.
Unable to find an instance for the variable x.
Found no subterm matching "?l ⊕ ?l0" in the current goal.
The reference Hc2 was not found in the current environment.

In environment H3 : forall a b : lb, a ⪯ b -> {c : lb | a ⟂ c /\\ b ≂ a ↑ c} H2 : forall x y : lb, x ⟂ y -> x ⊕ y ≂ x ↑ y H1, H0 : forall a b : lb, a ⪯ b -> {c : lb | a ⟂ c /\\ b ≂ a ↑ c} a, b : lb H : a ⪯ b Unable to unify "?M3182 ⟂ ?M3184" with "exists x : lb, b ≂ a ⊕ x /\\ a ⪯ a ⊕ x".

In environment H6 : forall a b x : lb, a ⪯ b -> b ⟂ x -> a ⟂ x H5 : forall a b : lb, a ⪯ b -> {c : lb | a ⟂ c /\\ b ≂ a ↑ c} H4 : forall x y : lb, x ⟂ y -> x ⊕ y ≂ x ↑ y H3, H1, H0 : forall a b : lb, a ⪯ b -> {c : lb | a ⟂ c /\\ b ≂ a ↑ c} a, b : lb H : a ⪯ b Unable to unify "a ⪯ b" with "exists x : lb, b ≂ a ⊕ x /\\ a ⪯ a ⊕ x".

In environment H8 : forall a b x : lb, a ⪯ b -> b ⟂ x -> a ⟂ x H7 : forall a b : lb, a ⪯ b -> {c : lb | a ⟂ c /\\ b ≂ a ↑ c} H2 : forall x y : lb, x ⟂ y -> x ⊕ y ≂ x ↑ y H5, H3, H1, H0 : forall a b : lb, a ⪯ b -> {c : lb | a ⟂ c /\\ b ≂ a ↑ c} a, b : lb H : a ⪯ b Unable to unify "?M5103 ⟂ ?M5102" with "exists x : lb, b ≂ a ⊕ x /\\ a ⪯ a ⊕ x".
The reference Hc1 was not found in the current environment.

In environment H10 : forall a b x : lb, a ⪯ b -> b ⟂ x -> a ⟂ x H9 : forall a b : lb, a ⟂ b -> b ⟂ a H6 : forall a b : lb, a ⪯ b -> {c : lb | a ⟂ c /\\ b ≂ a ↑ c} H4 : forall x y : lb, x ⟂ y -> x ⊕ y ≂ x ↑ y H7, H5, H3, H1, H0 : forall a b : lb, a ⪯ b -> {c : lb | a ⟂ c /\\ b ≂ a ↑ c} a, b : lb H : a ⪯ b Unable to unify "?M6276 ⪯ ?M6276 ↑ ?M6277" with "exists x : lb, b ≂ a ⊕ x /\\ a ⪯ a ⊕ x".

original: intros H. destruct (lb_minus a b H) as [c [Hc1 Hc2]]. exists c. split. - rewrite lb_ortho_plus_join. + apply Hc2. + apply lb_ortho_anti_left with (b:=b). * apply H. * apply lb_ortho_sym. apply Hc1. - apply lb_join_inc_left.
